entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
